message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to own one of my products. With 1 out of 2 products being high-quality, the chances are that this one might be a gem! I've had a great response from previous buyers, and I'm confident you'll love it. Would you like to take a chance and make an offer?
I'm taking a chance on this product. I hope it's high quality!
